content: The weapon comes with a respectable 60 damage, and the unique effect of making the fourth move of moderately increasing the damage executed by charged smash heavy attacks. It also has a bonus 30 Defense.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cloud-Patterned_Stone_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff'.
The content is as follows:
The weapon comes with a respectable 60 damage, and the unique effect of making the fourth move of moderately increasing the damage executed by charged smash heavy attacks. It also has a bonus 30 Defense.
